name: Diagram pattern search
description:
This is very challenging diagrams pattern finding new game in which you focused on 6 rows and 6 columns of diagrams and find the target pattern of diagram as quickly as possible to earn more score and solve most exciting and entertaining  diagram finding challenges.
This  game is free ,colorful and new puzzle game.  You just need to  focus on challenging  diagrams patterns and look the target diagrams pattern and find them as quickly as possible. The Diagram Finder contains beautiful and relaxing music to relax you. All exciting features of  Diagram Finder is only 13 MB size as a whole.
If you not able to understand the game Play. Not worry , The Diagram Finder contain the easy tutorial to make you understand the gameplay fast and easily.
The more you score the challenge of diagrams pattern finding is get more exciting and entertaining.
